usageNotes.clearspace: Minimum clearspace of 0.5x shield height on all sides
usageNotes.background: Prefer white or light backgrounds; dark variant available for dark backgrounds
usageNotes.colors: Official red (#ED1C24) and blue (#0033A0); monochrome knockout permitted
usageNotes.modifications: Do not distort, rotate, or alter proportions

usageNotes.clearspace: Minimum clearspace of 0.25x oval width on all sides
usageNotes.background: Works on light or dark backgrounds
usageNotes.colors: Official red and black; knockout white version available
usageNotes.modifications: Do not alter shape or proportions

usageNotes.background: Prefer white or light gray backgrounds
usageNotes.colors: Official blue and red; monochrome versions available
usageNotes.modifications: Maintain wordmark legibility; do not separate droplet from wordmark

usageNotes.background: Works on light backgrounds; reverse version for dark
usageNotes.colors: Official red oval badge with black text
usageNotes.modifications: Do not alter oval shape or proportions
